        Skills yêu cầu
          Có kinh nghiệm lập trình web dùng ReactJS, JavaScript/TypeScript, html/css, bootstrap
          Có kinh nghiệm dùng Redux Saga / Redux Thunk,  Redux Hook
          Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng Rest API
          Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng git
          Sẵn sàng học hỏi, nghiên cứu các công nghệ mới
          Có thể làm được Java (java core / spring boot) hoặc có thể làm được Mobile app sử dụng Flutter
     Why you'll love working here
        Cơ hội phát triển
       Được làm việc với các chuyên gia công nghệ với trên 15 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực tài chính, fintech
       Số lượng giải pháp và các sản phẩm rất nhiều với nhiều thử thách đa dạng, giúp phát triển nghề nghiệp.
       Luôn được tiếp cận công nghệ mới nhất, tối ưu hóa năng lực sản xuất phần mềm
       Quy trình phát triển DevOps, tự động hóa nhiều trong quy trình
       Giải pháp tổng thể từ Front Office (iOS, Android, Flutter, ReactJS, .NET) – Middleware – Back Office với nhiều công nghệ chuyên sâu J2EE, Sping Framework, jBase, Nodejs, Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, Apache Flink, Hadoop, ElasticSearch, Oracle Database, SQL Server, Memory Database, Caching…được triển khai tại nhiều tổ chức tài chính, chứng khoán hàng đầu thế giới
       Được tham gia vào các dự án phần mềm, các mô hình phát triển ứng dụng cao cấp với các đối tác hàng đầu Nhật Bản: các ứng dụng trong lĩnh vực tài chính, fintech
       Được tiếp cận và đào tạo theo quy trình quản lý dự án phần mềm chuyên nghiệp theo chuẩn Nhật Bản như ISO 9001:2013, ISMS ISO 27001:2013
        Chế độ đãi ngộ
       Lương cứng + Lương tháng thứ 13 + thưởng các dịp lễ, tết + lương hiệu quả kinh doanh;
       Có chế độ riêng cho các leader ở các cấp khác nhau
       Hưởng bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm y tế theo chế độ nhà nước ban hành.
       Thưởng dự án, review kết quả công việc 6 tháng một lần.
       Tuần làm việc 5 ngày, nghỉ thứ bảy, chủ nhật và các ngày lễ tết. Làm thêm ngoài giờ được tính tiền làm thêm = 150% ngày bình thường.
       Khám tổng thể sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm tại các bệnh viện quốc tế
       Du lịch 1 năm tối thiểu 1 lần, tháng tháng/quý có các hoạt động ngoại khóa, team building
       Được đào tạo hàng tuần về chuyên môn kĩ thuật, nghiệp vụ và các chương trình đào tạo kĩ năng mềm khác như quản lý dự án, quản lý cảm xúc, não bộ, sức khỏe, giải tỏa stress, thiền cho kĩ sư…
        Văn hóa
       Môi trường làm việc cởi mở, sẵn sàng chia sẻ, giúp đỡ lẫn nhau để cùng phát triển

        Skills yêu cầu

     Why you'll love working here
        Cơ hội phát triển
       Được làm việc với các chuyên gia công nghệ với trên 15 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực tài chính, fintech
       Số lượng giải pháp và các sản phẩm rất nhiều với nhiều thử thách đa dạng, giúp phát triển nghề nghiệp.
       Luôn được tiếp cận công nghệ mới nhất, tối ưu hóa năng lực sản xuất phần mềm
       Quy trình phát triển DevOps, tự động hóa nhiều trong quy trình
       Giải pháp tổng thể từ Front Office (iOS, Android, Flutter, ReactJS, .NET) – Middleware – Back Office với nhiều công nghệ chuyên sâu J2EE, Sping Framework, jBase, Nodejs, Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, Apache Flink, Hadoop, ElasticSearch, Oracle Database, SQL Server, Memory Database, Caching…được triển khai tại nhiều tổ chức tài chính, chứng khoán hàng đầu thế giới

       Thưởng dự án, review kết quả công việc 6 tháng một lần.
       Tuần làm việc 5 ngày, nghỉ thứ bảy, chủ nhật và các ngày lễ tết. Làm thêm ngoài giờ được tính tiền làm thêm = 150% ngày bình thường.
       Khám tổng thể sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm tại các bệnh viện quốc tế

        Văn hóa

Product Owner - AGI / LLM for Enterprise
      Trusting Social
       Sign in to view salary
      Apply now
       Havana Tower - 132 Ham Nghi, District 1, Ho Chi Minh
       At office
       8 days ago
       Skills:
         Product Manager
         Python
         English
     Top 3 reasons to join us
      Top Salary, Awesome Benefits
      Premium healthcare for 3 members in family
      Grab to work, Lunch allowance for all employee
     Job description
       Trusting Social and the AGI revolution
      Trusting Social has been the leading AI solution provider for the banking industry in Southeast Asia and India in the last 10 years.
      We are now pioneering Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) solutions to reimagine banking in the post-AGI world. We believe this will spark the next revolution in productivity and experience, like the Internet and mobile computing have done before.
      We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced
       Product Owner - General AI / LLM for Enterprise
      to join our team.
      The successful candidate will lead the development of new AGI products to transform the banking and finance experience of billions of customers.
       How You Will Make An Impact In This Role Responsibilities
      As a Product Owner in AGI Product at Trusting Social, you will have the decision-making and prioritization authority to drive a particular workstream, under the leadership of a Product Manager. You will solve impactful problems in the financial sector in Vietnam and other Trusting Social markets.
      You will be at the cutting edge of technology & creating innovative, transformative solutions that make banking more accessible, affordable, and personalized for every customer.
      If you're genuinely passionate about building world-changing products and never settling for second place, join us on a journey of discovery to solve problems and deliver excellence.
       Responsibilities
       Contribute to building the roadmap for the development of a new AI product combining the power of LLM technologies such as GPT-4 and Trusting Social’s strength in predictive AI
       Own the roadmap for your workstream, you are responsible for the success and impact that your workstream bring to our client & the product as a whole
       Work with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize features that will add value to clients in the banking and finance sector
       Translate product requirements into detailed user stories with clear acceptance criteria for development teams
       Ensure that the product meets the highest standards of quality and performance in your workstream
       Collaborate with developers, data scientists, and engineers to ensure successful product delivery
       Monitor and analyze market trends and emerging technologies to provide insights on potential new features and enhancements
       Continuously improve the product backlog and prioritize user stories to align with company strategy
       Create and maintain product documentation to ensure effective communication with stakeholders
     Your skills and experience
       Required
       Ability to zoom in - analyzing a problem, pain point in depth; and zoom out - maintaining a clear picture of business impact, constraints, dependencies of all features & problems to effectively prioritize and ensure overall success
       Go to the bottom of things, problems, metrics to derive key drivers. Listen intensely and think deeply to discover disruptive insights
       Mindful of feelings, emotions, needs and wants of customers, colleagues and yourself
       Exceptional problem-solving skills: think from first principles to validate insights, ask thoughtful questions, create well considered solutions that have a clear path to delivering large value
       Good analytical and abstraction skills, with the ability to break down complex problems into smaller parts and identify key issues
       Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, and ability to articulate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders with clarity of thought
       Ability to translate business requirements into clear and concise user stories with acceptance criteria
       Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and build strong relationships with stakeholders
       Extreme ownership, ready to roll up your sleeves and do whatever it takes to realize the vision
       Ability to maintain a keen attention to detail, keeping commitment with multiple objectives, and work well under pressure
       Strong learning ability and self-motivation to acquire new knowledge
       Preferred
       Degree or strong experience in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Consulting
       Experience with Banking & Financial B2B products, especially AI solutions
       Knowledge of AI/Machine Learning topics
     Why you'll love working here
        Competitive compensation package, including 13th-month salary and performance bonuses
        Comprehensive health care coverage for you and your dependents
        Generous leave policies, including annual leave, sick leave, and flexible work hours
        Convenient central district 1 office location, next to a future metro station
        Onsite lunch with multiple options, including vegetarian
        Grab for work allowance and fully equipped workstations
        Fun and engaging team building activities, sponsored sports clubs, and happy hour every Thursday
        Unlimited free coffee, tea, snacks, and fruit to keep you energized
        An opportunity to make a social impact by helping to democratize credit access in emerging markets
      Trusting Social
        View company
     Making Financial Inclusion a Reality using Machine Learning and AI

      Company size

      Monday - Friday

     Job description
        Get to know Papaya:
       Papaya is created to protect the financial assets of millions of people across Southeast Asia through insurance products. We use data and technology to improve the century-old industry and provide valuable safety nets for customers. We are focused on pioneering new ways of creating, distributing, and servicing insurance products for the digital age. Global funds and strong partnerships with top-tier insurers back Papaya.
        Job Description:
        Design, implement, and maintain state-of-the-art TypeScript applications for the Insurance Industry with complex logic and workflows.
        Work with DevOps and Data engineers on IaC, Security, Performance, and Database Scalability for your Backend.
        Work with other Software Engineers in an Event-Driven SOA/Microservices platform employing the power of Cloud Native, Serverless, and GraphQL.
        Research to improve system performance, security & reliability.
        Engage in Tech Team’s spearhead projects to pioneer new technologies in the Cloud Native space.
     Your skills and experience
        Minimum 3 years of experience in JavaScript/TypeScript.
        Experience in ReactJS or NodeJS is required.
        Experience in either Linux, PostgreSQL, or AWS is highly preferred.
        Experience in GraphQL, AWS Lambda, Serverless.com, and Hasura is a huge plus.
        Understanding major software architectures such as Monolith, SOA, Microservices, and Serverless, including their pros and cons is a huge plus.
        Having the ambition to become one of the best software engineers in the market with great deliverables and deep technical knowledge.
        Strong in team-working and peer influence
        Fun to work with
     Why you'll love working here
        Benefit:
        Compensation: competitive with room for significant salary bonuses
        Personal Development - You’ll work and learn from one of the best and brightest technological & entrepreneurial teams in Asia
        Working environment: A young and dynamic startup, with lots of space to grow and to make a milestone for yourself
        Fully participate in the insurance regimes as prescribed by law
        Participate in health insurance
        Team Building activities, year-end party, dining with company
        Being with Papaya:
        You will be constantly challenged with generating user values while performing well technically.
        You will be encouraged to make decisions on your own while being pressed for what is right.
        You will be stretched not in your ability to deliver big but in your attention to details.
        You will be expected to be a team player while being a leader in your own right.
        Your ownership will be valued, your obsession will be worshiped.
        Work gets more done. Intelligent work in long hours generates incredible results.
        We strongly believe net user values matter greater than any technical achievement.
        You will be positioned to be a servant of people, service of users rather than an elite engineer.

     Job description
        The opportunity
       We are a software (SaaS) company Based in  Hanoi Vietnam and Auckland New Zealand. Looking for a senior front end developer to join our friendly team. This role will offer:
        A flexible work environment with a tight-knit and supportive team.
        Huge delegated responsibility. We are a small team achieving big things. We empower members of the team to reach their potential.
       If you want to challenge yourself, and take ownership of the direction of your work this role is for you.
       About us
       We are an experienced team having worked together for years. We have two key software projects that our teams work on: ; a leading tool for financial advisers in NZ with strong growth, and ; an innovative startup focused on transforming how users report software issues. While our primary focus is on Dummi, outstanding candidates may be considered for both projects.
        We work hard, and make huge amounts of progress for such a small team.
        We respect each team member for their differences and focus on bringing out the best in each other.
        We believe in training our staff to be skilled enough to leave, and treating them well enough that they want to stay.
         The role
       We are seeking a senior front end developer to join our team. You will work closely with our product team, and existing front end and back end developers in Hanoi and in Auckland. And will be involved in working on exciting new projects, leading and mentoring the junior front end developers alongside our other senior staff, and being involved in product discussions and decision making about how the business will move forward.
       If you join with us you will be
        Working with the product team as part of planning and validating ideas to ensure they are feasible and valuable
        Implementing new features and improvements within our current products and building new products from the ground up as part of a team.
        Helping to lead the front end team, being responsible with the other senior developers to set the standards, tools and processes, as well as providing mentorship to the wider team.
     Your skills and experience
        Requirements
       An ideal candidate will:
        Be fluent in both spoken and written English
        Work well as part of a team, and able to work with a team across time zones
        Proactive communicator who will raise challenges or concerns with their team
        Have at least 5 years experience as a front end developer
        Proficient with using IDEs such as VS or VSCode
        Proficient with React JS
        Be a self starter, able to take the initiative and work on valuable tasks autonomously
     Why you'll love working here
       Pay range Competitive USD salary based on your experience (1200$-1700$). Net monthly salary
       13th-month bonus
       Allowance for insurance and tax (We are in the process of registration which will allow Trail to manage tax and insurance payments on your behalf)
       Flexible starting/finishing times
       Annual leave 12 days/year (flexible)
       Review salary once a year (flexible)
       Offer free snacks, coffee, tea, ..
       Support for self-development (book, online course, certification, technical sharing session…)
       Parking allowance
       Birthday party and present
       Work desktop and work phone plan
       Huge career and development opportunities
       Creative space and work environment
       Great chance to learn English while gaining experience working with an international company
       Freestyle dress code, no uniforms

02 Sr. QA QC Tester (Manual / Automation)
      VUS
       Sign in to view salary
      Apply now
       189 Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, District 1, Ho Chi Minh
       At office
       8 days ago
       Skills:
         Tester
         QA QC
         Automation Test
     Top 3 reasons to join us
      VUS scholarship for yourself & your loved ones
      Stable and long-term commitment, young culture
      100% salary during probation period
     Job description
      VUS is looking for 2 Tester:
       1 Automation Tester
       1 Manual Tester
       SCOPE OF WORK
       MANUAL:
      As a QA/QC Engineer, you will be responsible for product testing and quality assurance to ensure high quality product deliverables to end-users, with a mission to:
       Develop, maintain and troubleshoot quality for web-based and mobile app products.
       Work closely with Frontend, Backend, Mobile developers and Scrum Teams to ensure high quality of product deliverables.
       Contribute to the continuous improvement process of overall QA/QC practices.
       AUTOMATION:
       Develop and maintain advanced automation scripts for web-based and mobile-based products, ensuring top-quality user experiences.
       Conduct thorough automation regression testing for sprint releases, aiming for timely and efficient outcomes.
       Work closely with QA Manual members and Scrum Teams, creating a cooperative environment to ensure product quality through our automation systems.
       Proactively contribute to the continuous enhancement of QA practices, introducing innovative ideas and solutions to complex challenges.
       Keep up-to-date with the latest automation trends and technologies, striving for increased efficiency and effectiveness.
     Your skills and experience
       MANUAL SKILLS REQUIREMENTS & QUALIFICATIONS
       (Requirement for Manual Tester)
       At least 3 years of professional experience in testing digital software products and systems (web app, mobile app, APIs)
       Strong experience in developing and implementing quality assurance and quality control processes, policies, and procedures
       Strong experience in writing test case, test scenarios
       Familiarity with Postman tool and at least one version control system
       Basic knowledge with Cloud technologies
       Bachelor's degree in Quality Assurance, Engineering, Information Technology or related fields.
       Familiarity with online educational or mobile games products is a plus.
       AUTOMATION SKILLS REQUIREMENTS & QUALIFICATIONS:
       (Requirement for Automation Tester)
       A minimum of 3 years of professional experience in testing and developing automated tests for web and mobile applications, as well as APIs.
       A proactive and optimistic mindset, coupled with a strong can-do attitude.
       Adept at facing challenges, confidently navigating risks and managing conflicts effectively.
       Proficiency in at least one programming language (Python/Golang/Nodejs/Java) and eagerness to expand this knowledge.
       Experience with API Automation, Behavior-Driven Development (BDD), and Cloud technologies.
       Experience with version control systems, such as Git or SVN.
       Exceptional debugging skills and a comprehensive understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle.
       Experience with some tool stress test and load test such as Jmeter or K6 or Locust
       A blend of testing expertise and automation coding skills, with a keen eye for detail and commitment to quality.
       PERSONALITY
       You have strong interpersonal and problem-solving skills
       You are an optimistic, open-minded and great team player.
       Possess excellent attention to detail and accuracy in identifying and documenting quality issues.
       Possess logical and analytical thinking to quickly and rationally identify
       You are highly adaptable, inspirational and possess an entrepreneurial spirit.
     Why you'll love working here
       Stable and long-term commitment, young culture
       24/7 insurance; Annual health check
       VUS scholarship for yourself & your loved ones
       100% salary during probation period
        Staff Outing
        12 Annual Leave days, 3 years plus 1 day

     Job description
        Develops, implements, and manages processes to ensure that products and applications meet required specifications for quality, functionality, and reliability before delivery.
        Establishes and defines appropriate quality benchmarks and criteria for products and applications.
        Conveys quality benchmarks and criteria to the QA team, software development team, and relevant stakeholders.
        Ensures QA team productivity and identifies opportunities for greater efficiency and quality improvement.
        Lead QA process improvement initiatives and maintain and continuously improve existing test development processes and practices.
        Coordinates product testing processes and may participate in product testing.
        Identifies and analyses issues, bugs, defects, and other problems, particularly when problems recur in multiple products; recommends and facilitates solutions to these issues.
        Manages QA team on hiring, discipline, performance reviews, and resource allocation.
        Enhances testing capabilities guided by standard best practices, policies, and procedures.
        Mentor other QA team members and assist them with domain knowledge.
        Leads training activities on QA-related topics.
     Your skills and experience
        Qualifications and experience
        University Degree Qualified in a Tech or Business field.
        Over 10 years of experience in software testing.
        Experience working in the payments and financial services industries an advantage.
        Experience with automated testing frameworks and integrating automated testing into the CI/CD pipeline will be an advantage.
        Key skills
        Over 5 years of experience leading quality assurance teams.
        Proven ability to develop and implement quality standards effectively.
        Extensive testing expertise in the entire software development life cycle and various test cycles, including Regression, Functional, Systems, Stress & Scale, Smoke & Sanity.
        Familiarity with QA best practices and methodologies for designing, implementing, and automating processes.
        Proficient in aligning testing strategies with business objectives.
        Effective in taking ownership of business outcomes and motivating teams to take responsibility for their decisions.
        Outstanding communication skills that promote open dialogue and mutual respect among stakeholders.
        Exceptional time management abilities with a track record of meeting deadlines.
        Strong analytical and critical thinking capabilities.
     Why you'll love working here
       - Fully social insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law
       - Full salary on probation
      - 13th month salary and performance bonus
      - Annual leave: 14 days/ year  + 01 day off for birthday leave
      - Performance review twice a year

       - Premium Health Care Insurance (covering for spouse and children)
       - Personal Learning & Career Development Program (15.6 millions VND/ year)
      - Health Scheme Program
      - Laptop provided (Macbook/Window)
      - Free parking, coffee, snacks, etc
      - Attractive career path
      - Regular team dinners and team building activities
      - International and friendly working environment

     Job description
       Tham gia các dự án triển khai nền tảng và phát triển các sản phẩm, dịch vụ Ngân hàng số. Phối hợp chặt chẽ với PO, BA để nắm bắt các yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và đưa ra giải pháp kỹ thuật phù hợp.
       Xây dựng tài liệu và bảo vệ các kiến trúc giải pháp kỹ thuật, đảm bảo đáp ứng các yêu cầu nghiệp vụ cũng như các yêu cầu phi chức năng.
       Dẫn dắt và hỗ trợ team phát triển ứng dụng. Phối hợp với team hạ tầng, bảo mật, vận hành để triển khai các sản phẩm, dịch vụ Ngân hàng số. Đảm bảo tính tin cậy, bảo mật và hiệu năng cao cho hệ thống.
       Tham gia team dự án Agile, thực hiện các công việc: hỗ trợ xây dựng User Stories, Backlog grooming, thiết kế giải pháp, hỗ trợ kỹ thuật, hỗ trợ Automation Test và CI/CD.
     Your skills and experience
       Bằng cấp:
      Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin/Điện tử viễn thông/Kinh tế/Ngân hàng.
       Kinh nghiệm:
      tối thiểu 6 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực phát triển phần mềm trong lĩnh vực Tài chính, Ngân hàng, Viễn thông, bất động sản.
       Kỹ năng:
       Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế kiến trúc và triển khai nền tảng số, các sản phẩm dịch vụ số cho các doanh nghiệp ngành Tài chính, Ngân hàng.
       Hiểu biết sâu sắc và có kinh nghiệm thực tế với các nguyên lý thiết kế/ mô hình kiến trúc như Object-Oriented Design (OOD), SOA, Microservice Architecture (MSA), and Event-Driven Architecture (EDA).
       Thành thạo lập trình hướng đối tượng với Java. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Security, Maven, OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, SAML.
       Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế và phát triển RESTful API, Web socket.
       Làm việc tốt với cơ sở dữ liệu SQL/NoSQL.
       Có kinh nghiệm tư vấn kỹ thuật, đẫn dắt Agile/Scrum team.
       Hiểu biết và có kinh nghiệm thực tế với Cloud, DevOps, CI/CD, Container, Docker, k8s.
       Nhiệt tình, trách nhiệm với công việc.
       Có kỹ năng tư duy chiến lược, phân tích, xây dựng quy trình, sản phẩm công nghệ số.
       Kỹ năng phát hiện và phòng ngừa rủi ro trong quy trình, hoạt động liên quan công nghệ số.
       Lập kế hoạch và quản lý thời gian hiệu quả.
       Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề tốt.
       Giao tiếp tốt bằng tiếng Anh.
       Đặc biệt ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc với nền tảng Backbase.
     Why you'll love working here
       Lương và phúc lợi hấp dẫn:
       Mức lương cạnh tranh, phản ánh trực tiếp kỹ năng và kinh nghiệm của ứng viên (chi tiết sẽ được thảo luận trong buổi phỏng vấn).
       13 ngày nghỉ phép linh hoạt, bao gồm ngày sinh nhật và các dịp quan trọng khác.
       Bảo hiểm đầy đủ theo luật lao động, cùng với ABBANK CARE - chương trình phúc lợi bổ sung đặc biệt dành cho ABBankers.
       Lãi suất vay ưu đãi - Quyền lợi đặc biệt dành cho nhân viên ABBANK.
       Cơ hội phát triển nghề nghiệp hấp dẫn:
       Gia nhập các dự án chuyển đổi quy mô lớn, cộng tác cùng các chuyên gia hàng đầu để áp dụng công nghệ mới nhất trong ngành ngân hàng.
       Lộ trình phát triển sự nghiệp rõ ràng, được tạo điều kiện cho cả sự phát triển kỹ thuật và quản lý.
       Hỗ trợ đào tạo và chứng chỉ trong lĩnh vực IT, ngân hàng/tài chính.
       Môi trường làm việc năng động:
       Mô hình làm việc linh hoạt, trẻ trung, khuyến khích đổi mới và sáng tạo.
       Văn phòng được trang bị hiện đại, kèm theo các thiết bị tiên tiến nhất dành cho nhân viên.
       Tổ chức thường xuyên các hoạt động ngoại khóa (team building, hội thảo, và các sự kiện văn nghệ), tạo điều kiện cho nhân viên gắn kết và phát triển.

Senior Tester (Manual/Automation/QA QC) - TNEX Finance
      Tập đoàn ROX (ROX Group)
       Sign in to view salary

       Tòa nhà TNR, 54A Nguyễn Chí Thanh, Dong Da, Ha Noi
       At office
       8 days ago
       Skills:
         QA QC
         Agile
         Tester
     Top 3 reasons to join us
      Làm việc tại Đại dự án chuyển đổi số chiến lược
      Gói thu nhập năm từ 14 đến 16 tháng lương
      Cơ hội thăng tiến, tưởng thưởng xứng đáng
     Job description
       Thực hiện kiểm thử cho các dự án phát triển công nghệ:
       Nghiên cứu yêu cầu người dùng, điều kiện chấp nhận, chi tiết yêu cầu về phần mềm, thiết kế để xác định yêu cầu kiểm thử của dự án;
       Tham gia lập kế hoạch kiểm thử dựa trên các rủi ro, mức độ quan trọng, tần suất sử dụng, và xác định các yêu tố liên quan như: phương pháp, đo lường, nguồn lực, điều kiện kiểm thử...
       Tham gia xây dựng kịch bản kiểm thử, điều kiện kiểm thử, chuẩn bị dữ liệu kiểm thử ở các cấp: API Testing, Functionality Testing, GUI Testing, Regression Testing, Integration Testing, System Testing, User Acceptance Testing (Web App, Mobile App)
       Thực hiện ghi nhận lỗi và lập báo cáo cáo kiểm thử; đồng thời phân tích dữ liệu kiểm thử để đưa ra các đánh giá, giải pháp khắc phục và kế hoạch để nâng cao chất lượng kiểm thử;
       Phối hợp với các đơn vị liên quan giải quyết, khắc phục sự cố, đảm bảo chất lượng hệ thống
       Phối hợp với các đơn vị liên quan để tham mưu, hỗ trợ cấp trên trong việc nghiên cứu, lựa chọn, đề xuất, mua sắm hệ thống trang thiết bị kỹ thuật và phần mềm phục vụ việc kiểm thử theo đúng quy định hiện hành;
       Đề xuất cải tiến quy trình kiểm thử nhằm nâng cao chất lượng kiểm thử đối với các dự án phát triển công nghệ;
     Your skills and experience
       Tối nghiệp Đại học trở lên với chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, điện tử viễn thông, tài chính, ngân hàng và các chuyên ngành liên quan
       Tối thiểu
        3 năm kinh nghiệm
       về lĩnh vực phát triển phần mềm, phân tích nghiệp vụ, kiểm thử các sản phẩm fintech, banking
       Có kinh nghiệm với kiểm thử hiệu năng (Performance)
       Vững kiến thức và kinh nghiệm về kiểm thử thủ công (Manual), có kinh nghiệm và kiến thức tốt về kỹ thuật kiểm thử & thiết kế kịch bản kiểm thử.
       Có kinh nghiệm trong việc chuẩn bị dữ liệu kiểm thử trong cơ sở dữ liệu.
       Có kinh nghiệm và kiến thức tốt về kiểm thử tự động (Automation), sử dụng các công cụ như: Selenium, Appium, RestAssured, Serenity, Postman, Jmeter, Java, Maven Kinh nghiệm với quy trình phát triển phần mềm Agile - Scrum, kinh nghiệm với thử nghiệm white box là một lợi thế, Làm việc hiệu quả trong môi trường có cường độ nhanh, chú ý chi tiết
     Why you'll love working here
       Làm việc trong các dự án chuyển đổi số mang tính CHIẾN LƯỢC & TIÊN PHONG của Tập đoàn với dạng ngành nghề, mảng công việc, có nhiều hướng lựa chọn phát triển chuyên môn...

     Job description
      As a Software Test Engineer in Swisslog, you are helping to:
        Contributing to the implementation of our software product to meet customer needs in the area of automated warehouse and distribution solutions.
        Analyzing user requirements and coordinate with project stakeholders to provide comprehensive spec in early phase of project.
        Design and execute manual test cases during iterations.
        Implement and execute Software Integration Test, System Test to ensure quality. (subsystems/robotics interaction and operator user interfaces)
        Documentation of the solution and creation of user manuals.
        Go onsite integration (EU, Dubai, KSA, etc.) of our software with other subsystems/robotics and the customer‘s systems at the customer side .
        Close collaboration with our customers, our software teams in Germany, Switzerland and other countries during the projects.
        Take ownership on quality gate to ensure project will be transit to Customer Service/Operation phase smoothly.
        Coordinate with local team and international teams to handle customer support activities.
        Incident and problem management.
        Go onsite (EU, Dubai, KSA, etc.) to train and support the customer in terms of warehouse operation.
     Your skills and experience
        At least 02 year of experience in Automation Testing system (Java, Jenkins, WebDriver, Junit, SOAP, Mockito, etc.);
        At least 03 year of experience in Manual System Testing.
        Ability to communicate in English (intermediate level or above).
       Ability to analyze requirements and consult project stakeholders.
       Design test cases from spec, design, use cases
       Knowledge about Oracle PL/SQL or SQL Server is a plus.
       Passionate about coding and software quality.
       Team spirit and right working attitude.
       Ability to handle automated system test.
       Ability to handle 24/7 customer support activities.
       Ability to travel to Germany, Switzerland, Dubai, and other countries.
        Working Domains
       Technical:
        SQL, Java, Robotics/Hardware communication
       Soft-skills:
        Communication, English, Mobility
       Business:
        Intralogistics
        All interviews are will to be done in English.
     Why you'll love working here
      Swisslog offers challenging work in a globally networked environment as well as competitive salary and social benefits. At Swisslog, every employee is valued and plays an important role in achieving our vision and goals. Everything we do revolves around our corporate values of competence, collaboration, commitment and clarity. To shape a successful future, we promote a culture of passion and innovation, and offer an environment where your talent can be nurtured.

        100% Salary payment during probation period;
        Bonus: 13th month salary;
        Bonus: 14th month salary;
        Working onsite to abroad countries;
        Working hybrid with 3 days in the office;
        Flexible working time;

       Insurance is according to the VN labor law and based on gross salary;

       Happy lunch every Friday and other team activities monthly;

       Tiếng Nhật tương đương N2 trở lên
       Ít nhất 3 năm Kinh nghiệm làm việc ở Nhật
       Từ  3 năm kinh nghiệm làm quản lý (BrSE, Team lead, Project Manager …)
       Có kinh nghiệm quản lý dự án: phân bổ task, quản lý task, làm báo cáo
       Có thể đọc, viết specs, bản thiết kế bằng tiếng Nhật
       Có khả năng leadership, có ý thức trách nhiệm cao, có tinh thần làm việc teamwork, chịu được áp lực cao
       Thành thạo và có kinh nghiệm sử dụng ít nhất 1 ngôn ngữ lập trình : PHP, iOS, Java ...
        Bạn có là lợi thế (Không bắt buộc):
        Có khả năng quản lý kế hoạch dự án, khả năng đàm phán và thuyết phục
        Xây dựng và duy trì tốt các mối quan hệ với khách hàng người Nhật
        Sử dụng thành thạo 1 hệ quản trị CSDL, đặc biệt là MS SQL server, Oracle
     Why you'll love working here
         Phúc lợi
        - Mức lương cạnh tranh và nhiều gói chế độ hấp dẫn khác;
         Phát triển cá nhân
        - Cơ hội học ngoại ngữ miễn phí, tiếp cận nhiều công nghệ mới và nhiều cơ hội thử thách với các dự án khác nhau;
         Môi trường -
        Cơ hội làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, năng động, sáng tạo - nơi mà tất cả mỗi cá nhân, tập thể tại Hybrid Technologies ngày càng trở nên tuyệt vời hơn thông qua việc cùng nhau phát triển và nỗ lực hiện thực hóa giấc mơ chung.
        Gói phúc lợi hấp dẫn mà chúng tôi mang tới cho bạn:
         Chế độ lương - thưởng:
        Mức lương cạnh tranh & hấp dẫn. Lương tháng 13 và các khoản thưởng khác theo quy chế công ty. Phụ cấp ăn trưa, gửi xe hay quà tặng các ngày lễ trong năm (8/3, 20/10, Trung Thu, …). Chế độ tăng ngày phép theo thâm niên.
         Đánh giá hiệu suất công việc:
        2 lần/năm.
         Chăm sóc sức khỏe:
        Gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn phần dành cho nhân viên & mở rộng dành cho người thân nhân viên có thâm niên làm việc. Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm.
         Hoạt động ngoại khóa do công ty tài trợ:
        Du lịch hàng năm. Hoạt động từ thiện. Các giải đấu do công ty tổ chức: Bóng đá, Bóng bàn, E-sport ...
         Đào tạo:
        Trung tâm đào tạo dành riêng cho Fresher, Lớp đào tạo kĩ năng mềm, kĩ năng kĩ thuật; tài trợ cho nhân viên thi chứng chỉ phục vụ công việc.
         Môi trường làm việc:
        Không gian chung và không gian làm việc xanh-sạch-năng động,  cùng trang thiết bị làm việc luôn được cập nhật mới nhất.

     Top 3 reasons to join us

     Job description
      As a
       Senior Data Engineer,
      you'll be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying a scalable, secure, and open-source based data platform on the
       AWS cloud
      .
       Design and implement a robust data platform architecture on AWS, leveraging open-source technologies whenever possible.
       Evaluate and select appropriate open-source tools and services for data ingestion, transformation, storage, and analytics.
       Develop and maintain data pipelines for efficient movement and processing of large datasets.
       Ensure data quality and consistency throughout the data lifecycle.
       Implement data security best practices to protect sensitive information.
       Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data needs and translate them into technical requirements.
       Automate data platform tasks and processes for improved efficiency and reliability.
       Monitor and troubleshoot data platform performance to identify and resolve issues proactively.
       Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies in the data engineering space.
       Document data platform design, architecture, and processes for future reference.
     Your skills and experience
       Must have :
        Proven experience (4+ years) as a Senior Data Engineer or similar role.
       Strong understanding of data engineering principles and best practices.
       Expertise in designing and building scalable data pipelines.
       Proficient in working with
        open-source data technologies
       (e.g., Apache Spark, Apache Airflow, Kafka, etc.).
       Experience with cloud platforms, preferably
        AWS
       .
       Solid knowledge of
        SQL
       and experience with relational databases.
       Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
       Ability to work independently and as part of a cross-functional team.
       Nice to have :
       Experience with machine learning and data science workflows.
       Experience with data governance and data security frameworks.
       Experience with DevOps principles and practices.
       Experience building data platforms for similar industries.
     Why you'll love working here
       Working time from Monday to Friday (09:00 am - 18:00 pm).
       Good chance to study and develop career path stably with internal promotion and rotation.
       100% statutory insurance contribution as per the labor law.
       Bao Viet Healthcare insurance.
       100% gross salary in probation.
       12 Annual Leave (AL) per year + extra 1 AL per extra working year.
       Annual bonus: depending on business & individual performance.
       Annual salary review.
       Other rewards: 5-star, employee of the month (EOTM), employee of the year (EOTY), loyalty employee (3-year, 5-year, 8-year, etc.)
       Internal Activities: General Meeting, Company Trip, International Women's Day, Vietnamese Women's Day Mid-Autumn Festival, Family Day, Christmas, Year-end Party, etc.

      We are one of the fastest growing HRTech SAAS start-ups in Thailand. We focus on creating amazing experiences for our customers while rewarding our employees at the same time.
      Our apps are being used by over 50,000 users and growing rapidly. Our 250+ client portfolio includes multi-national corporations such as Krones, Ecolab, Mitsubishi, SPIE Ogs, Carro and many more.
      You will help team to write and test code for various applications, fix bugs, and contribute to the development of software features of ByteHR web apps with latest technologies. You will work directly alongside the head of engineering. Your work will be crucial to the continued growth and success of our business and to improve the amazing user experience we create in our apps.
     Your skills and experience
       Degree in Software Development or equivalent.

       Strong knowledge about software development methodologies, tools and clean architecture.
       Strong knowledge about OOP and design patterns such as CQRS.
       Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.

       Good communication skills combined with confidence to be able to share opinions and contribute new ideas.
       Ability to take ownership and make important decisions when needed.

     Why you'll love working here

       Competitive salary with 13th month bonus.
       Annual salary reviews.

       Relocation bonus of VND 5M for candidates who live outside Da Nang.

       Annual company trips.
       Quarterly company parties.
       Culture
       You'll join a team of energetic and driven individuals who continue to innovate everyday to build best-in-class HR technology.
       The lean org structure fosters ownership and responsibility and your work will be critical to the continued success of the company.
       We believe in continuous learning through experimentation and failures. Our culture of open communication allows you to share your opinions without fear of shaming or blaming.
       Our leaders are extremely dedicated and laser-focused in ensuring their teams are motivated and inspired. We know what it takes to build a great company and product; and there's a fire in our bellies that can never be put out.
       We strongly believe in team work. No single person knows everything and together we know a lot.

From e-commerce to checkout, to delivery software, we work on a wide range of products to make each day a success for our customers and colleagues. Our platform is designed to be multi-tenant, highly scalable, and highly available, ensuring a seamless experience for our customer base. We leverage a tech stack comprising Fullstack Typescript, React, Express, and Google Cloud to achieve these goals.

     Top 3 reasons to join us

     Job description
       Develops solution architecture and resolves complex issues in a variety of projects through the implementation of requirements analysis, expertise support and project supervision.
       Designs solution architecture in large or complex programs, including system and application designs, software and technical architecture, in accordance with strategies and objectives.
       Provides expertise for the solution architecture team and other IT staff on a variety of issues in software designs, system architecture and solution-oriented technologies.
       Communicates with clients and analyses business requirements and processes; makes recommendations and leads in shaping future plans in solution architecture.
       Oversees solution architecture project outcomes, including hardware and software design; ensures that each project phase meets overall requirements.
       Participating in technology selection
       Controlling solution development
       Supporting project management
       Academic: BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering
       Professional: 5+ years experience developing software as a software engineer; 3+ years experience as a solution architect or technical lead
       Business domain: Fintech, Hospitality, ERP experience is prefer
     Your skills and experience
      To provide management and engineering teams with technical advice, a solution architect must have a technical background with at least eight (08) years of work experience in one or more IT areas including but not limited to:
       IT architecture, infrastructure, and cloud development
       Engineering and software architecture design
       Business analysis
       DevOps
       Project and product management
       Analytical Thinking – Knowledge of techniques and tools that promote effective analysis and the ability to determine the root cause of organizational problems and create alternative solutions that resolve the problems in the best interest of the business.
       Effective Communications – Understanding of effective communication concepts, tools and techniques; ability to effectively transmit, receive, and accurately interpret ideas, information, and needs through the application of appropriate communication behaviors.
       Effectiveness Measurement – Ability to measure the quality and quantity of work effort for the purpose of improvement.
       Industry Knowledge – Knowledge of the organization's industry group, trends, directions, major issues, regulatory considerations, and trendsetters; ability to apply this knowledge appropriately to diverse situations.
       IT Standards, Procedures & Policies – Knowledge of and the ability to utilize a variety of administrative skill sets and technical knowledge to manage organizational IT policies, standards, and procedures.
       Planning: Tactical, Strategic – Ability to contribute to operational (short term), tactical (1-2 years) and strategic (3-5 years) planning in support of the overall business plan.
       Platform Architecture – Knowledge of technologies and methods to design processing mechanisms and roadmaps to execute business application systems; ability to design these roadmaps and deploy supportive interfaces for end-users to access related systems, in accordance with standards and processes.
       Problem Solving – Knowledge of approaches, tools, techniques for recognizing, anticipating, and resolving organizational, operational or process problems; ability to apply this knowledge appropriately to diverse situations.
       Software Product Design/Architecture – Knowledge of and experience with activities, tools and techniques for converting market requirements into the software product design.
       The Open Group Architecture Framework (TOGAF) – Knowledge of and ability to use this universal framework released by 'The Open Group' to effectively plan, develop and govern enterprise architecture.
     Why you'll love working here
       Không giới hạn mức lương thưởng, các bạn được tự quyết định quyền lợi của mình
       Cơ hội thăng tiến với các dự án Công nghệ mở rộng
       Triết lý kinh doanh “Phụng sự xã hội” lấy con người làm trọng tâm phát triển
      Với Apec Group, quản trị doanh nghiệp là sự tận dụng tối ưu hai nguồn lực quan trọng là Vốn và Con người, trong đó, những con người tài năng, tâm huyết, tử tế và phù hợp chính là chìa khóa giúp Công ty thành công và bền vững.
      Vì thế, ở đây, chúng tôi hy vọng bạn sẽ được là chính mình, trở thành một phần của một trong những doanh nghiệp thành công và hạnh phúc nhất, làm việc cùng với các nhà lãnh đạo và đồng nghiệp xuất sắc và đầy cảm hứng. Nếu bạn muốn cảm thấy tự hào về những gì bạn làm và khiến người khác cũng tự hào, hãy tham gia cùng chúng tôi và khám phá cách bạn có thể giúp tạo ra một doanh nghiệp tốt hơn, một Việt Nam tốt đẹp hơn và chính bạn tốt hơn.

     Job description
      At NFQ, we're all about developing cutting-edge apps, CRMs, ERPs, and other cross-platform products. Both for ourselves and for our clients that include HomeToGo, Kayak, Alaiko, Home24, and many others. We specialize in e-commerce, mobility, and transport & logistics, and we're always eager to tackle new challenges. Whatever the area – from Mobile to UX  – we've got a team that knows it inside out.
      Join our team of 800+ professionals across Germany, Poland, Lithuania, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, and Egypt. Make your own way with us.
      In this role you will
       You will be joining an awesome startup team to build cool applications that serve millions of users, from idea to production.
       As our customers are typically ambitious foreign startups, you will have a chance to improve your English, learn about startup culture and product mindset along the way. If you want to make a great impact on the world, this is your chance now.
       Managing full lifecycle customer projects with Agile methods.
       Developing strong relationships with customers, acting as the primary point of contact as well as managing stakeholder expectations and always seeking for solution improvement.
     Your skills and experience
       Strong knowledge of NodeJS, RESTful API (minimum 3 years of experience).
       Good experience with RDBMS like MySQL, PostgreSQL NoSQL like MongoDB, Redis.
       Ensures code modularity and DRYness for maintainability and ensures high performance on MicroServices.
       Advanced knowledge and best programming practices of web application vulnerabilities such as cross-site scripting (XSS), session hijacking, SQL injection, CSRF (Cross-Site Request Forgery), OWASP Top 10, and other attack vectors.
       Good English Communication skills.
      Big bonus:
       Experience with Front-end Frameworks like VueJS, ReactJS.
       Experience in automation tests, such as Unit Test, Functional Test, Integration Test.
       Experience in working with Cloud Computing, such as AWS / Google Cloud / Azure.
       Have good grip on Object Oriented Programming, MVC, Functional Programming.
       Experience in working with socket and streaming (eg. Socket.IO) is a plus.
       Knowledge in Open API Specifications/Swagger.
     Why you'll love working here
       Our values:
        Fairness:
       We are deeply committed to fairness in all our interactions. Whether it's with colleagues, customers, shareholders, or our environment, we uphold a culture of equity and respect in every aspect of our business.
        Entrepreneurship:
       Our ethos is shaped by the spirit of entrepreneurship. We value unconventional thinking, responsible risk-taking, and a relentless drive to turn innovative ideas into successful realities. This entrepreneurial mindset is what sets us apart.
        Excellence:
       At NFQ, excellence is about delivering 'WOW' experiences to all stakeholders. We strive for a standard of performance that not only meets but exceeds expectations, creating memorable and impactful experiences for both our customers and colleagues.
        Diversity and Equity:
       We embrace diversity, equity, and inclusion, recognizing their critical role in our success. We encourage an environment where everyone's unique contributions are valued and respected.
       And we always keep the NFQ soul in mind.
      That we are decent human beings to everyone around us.

Project Manager
      FuelCloud
       Sign in to view salary
      Apply now
       No 22, B2 Street, Sala Urban Residence, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh
       At office
       9 days ago
       Skills:
         Project Manager
         Team Leader
         English
     Top 3 reasons to join us
      Attractive Benefits and Salary packages
      Growth-focused environment, 15 days of PTO
      A fun-loving and passionate community of coworkers
     Job description
      The Firmware Project Manager is responsible for overseeing the development of firmware from concept through to delivery. This includes planning, execution, monitoring, and closing of firmware projects. The role involves collaboration with internal teams, cross-functional teams, managing timelines, and ensuring that projects meet quality standards and are delivered on schedule and within budget. The Firmware Project Manager will also be responsible for identifying and mitigating project risks, managing project resources, and maintaining comprehensive project documentation.
       Responsibilities and Duties:
       Project Planning and Management: Develop detailed project plans that outline scope, timeframes, budget, resources and deliverables that support business goals in collaboration with senior management and stakeholders.. Ensure the firmware projects are delivered on time, within scope and budget.
       Team Leadership: Lead and coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the flawless execution of projects. This includes the management of project teams involved in the design, development, and testing of firmware.
       Communication: Serve as the main point of contact for project communication, ensuring all stakeholders are kept informed of project status, milestones, and changes. Effectively communicate project expectations to team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion.
       Technical Guidance: Provide or review technical guidance and support to the project team, helping to solve complex firmware issues. Ensure that the firmware meets the technical specifications and quality standards.
       Risk Management: Identify project risks and develop strategies to mitigate them. Monitor project progress and make adjustments as necessary to ensure successful project completion.
       Documentation and Reporting: Manage and maintain comprehensive project documentation including requirements, design documents, project plans, and status reports. Prepare reports for upper management regarding the status of the project.
     Your skills and experience
       Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Management, or related field.
       Master’s degree or relevant project management certification (e.g., PMP) is preferred.
       Proven experience in firmware development and project management, ideally in an embedded systems environment.
       Strong familiarity with project management software tools, methodologies, and best practices.
       Strong technical background with understanding of software development.
       Experience seeing projects through the full life cycle.
       Excellent analytical skills.
       Proven ability to solve problems creatively.
       Experience with firmware development tools and methodologies.
       Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
       Strong organizational skills, including attention to detail and multitasking skills.
       Ability to lead and motivate a team of engineers and developers.
     Why you'll love working here
       We’ve worked hard to build the workplace culture we’ve always dreamed of - one where we celebrate each other's successes, work hard together, and know when it’s time to relax. We know that we can’t reach our goals alone, and think that our culture makes it a little easier to come to work and makes our biggest goals achievable. At FuelCloud, you’ll be using cutting-edge technology and taking on interesting challenges every day with a team that is genuinely happy to have you!
       Benefit
      :
       Attractive salary (Full salary during probationary period)
       Provide Laptop & Screens for working
       Ability to travel to US
       Working with expat team
       Premium health care insurance for you and your family
       Free annual health check
       15 days of PTO and no working OT
       Company trip & team dinners
       Many team activities: Birthday party, Mid-Autumn Festival, Christmas, Year End party,...

     Top 3 reasons to join us

     Job description
       Welcome to SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG
      We are a pioneering network of online marketplaces and a leading European digital company that simplifies people’s lives with forward-looking products.
       A little bit about us to help ignite your imagination
      SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG came together following the merger of Scout24 Switzerland and TX Markets in 2021,  a union that included some of Switzerland’s most well-known leading marketplaces.
      Our four business areas include Automotive, Real Estate, General Marketplaces, and Finance and Insurance.
       Over 700 employees
       13 Brands
       8 physical offices in 5 countries
       39.81M visits (October 2022)
       10.77M users (October 2022)
       Become a part of our winning team at SMG
       We hire the best digital talents to meet the highest demands of our users and customers in Switzerland. In return, we offer an attractive, innovative, friendly, and stimulating work environment where you can reach your full potential, achieve your goals, and celebrate your successes.
       SMG Swiss Marketplace Group Vietnam is an innovation center of SMG Group in Vietnam.
       We are officially named as one of
       the 2023 Asia & Vietnam Best Workplaces
       by the Great Place to Work Institute, the world's most well-known organization for work culture assessment.
       About the role
      SMG Real Estate (a business unit of SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG) is running the top 2 leading digital real estate classifieds platforms in Switzerland. We empower everyone to make the best decisions in Swiss real estate and bring commercial real estate agencies, owners and potential tenants and buyers together.
      We count more than 15 million visits from people who use our portal and have more than 100 million page views per month.
      The Platform Team at SMG Real Estate is responsible for SRE both as a discipline across Engineering and by owning the infrastructure on top of which our external facing products are built, in addition to, together with our Developer Experience team, provide and support the platform other engineering teams use to develop, deploy and operate their systems.
       What you will do
      As a Site Reliability Engineer, you will play a crucial role in enhancing our observability capabilities and maintaining high reliability standards.
       Main Responsibilities
       Defining observability standards and propose best practices for distributed tracing, monitoring and logging within a serverless ecosystem.
       Developing and maintaining an observability stack that product-focused teams can easily integrate into their services.
       Supporting engineering teams in defining and monitoring Service Level Indicators (SLIs) and Service Level Objectives (SLOs), ensuring both technical and business metrics are captured.
       Facilitating efficient incident management and disaster recovery processes, from initial response to postmortem analysis.
       Manage on-call rotations and improve communication during incidents, both internally and externally.
       Driving initiatives in resiliency and reliability, including chaos engineering, to proactively address potential service disruptions before they impact users.
       Leading educational efforts to improve use of tools like Datadog.
     Your skills and experience
       You must Have...
       Fluency in English, with excellent communication skills both verbally and in writing.
       Experience with AWS serverless ecosystem.
       Experience with GitHub Actions.
       Proficiency in using Datadog for observability.
       3+ years' experience in a similar role.
       It would be nice to have...
       Familiarity with AWS CDK and AWS X-Ray.
       AWS Certified DevOps Engineer Professional or similar certification.
       Experience in managing incident communication processes and on-call rotations.

       ABOUT US
      Live Payments is one of Australia's leading payment service providers, servicing thousands of businesses across Australia. We continue to innovate our payment solutions and expand our product offering alongside our industry-leading strategic partners, including Qantas Loyalty and Ingenico.
       Live Payments is seeking a talented and experienced
        Database Engineer
       to join our growing/ multi-national team. Reporting directly to our Vietnam-based Team Leader, the Database Engineer will work closely with the development team to design and implement database solutions and address stakeholders' business requirements.
        Core responsibilities include:
        Design database schema tables, stored procedures, views, functions, triggers, and indices to meet the application performance requirement.
        Design, develop and maintain ETL solutions for the data warehouse.
        Design, develop and maintain business reports for other departments.
        Design and write queries to extract data for ad hoc requests from other departments.
        Optimise databases to improve performance.
        Develop, manage, and test database backup and recovery plans.
        Review code and advise and guide developers on best practices for database queries and procedures.
        Provide consultation on issues related to data in the production environment.
        Carry out capacity planning and cost optimisation.
        Write and maintain database design documents.
        Monitor Quality Acceptance testing and User Acceptance Testing of the database.
        Troubleshoot and provide root cause analysis of major incidents and problems.
        Internal team training on anything database related.
        Maintain and administer databases in the test and staging environment.
        Prepare database deployment scripts and assist with production deployment.
        Assist Developers and Testers with database activities.
     Your skills and experience
        Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or another related field
        Minimum of 3+ years’ experience in database development and administration
        Knowledge of database architecture, data modelling, schema design and development
        Strong experience in Database Performance Tuning and Query Optimization
        Good experience in SQL Server, MySQL, NoSQL…
        Good experience in Reporting tools such as MS Reporting Services, Crystal Reports
        Good experience in BI, ETL, Database Analysis and Design skills
        Good experience in technologies that match the company's focus.
        Good English communication skills (written and oral)
        Good interpersonal and collaboration skills combined with a strong teamwork ability.
        Experience with Amazon Database services.
        Experience working on a commercial project to build a data warehouse.
        Experience working in the payments and/or financial services industries is advantageous.
        Experience with the data warehouse is an advantage.
        Experience in Data Analysis is an advantage.
        Experience with Database migration is an advantage.

        By applying for the above position, you accept and agree that your personal data and any information stated in the attached curriculum vitae (CV) will be used and processed by ITViec and NAB Vietnam for recruitment purposes. The storage and processing of such information will comply with the applicable laws of Vietnam, and the policies and procedures of ITViec and NAB Vietnam regarding personal data, as amended from time to time.
       ABOUT THE JOB
      As a Senior Project Analyst, you will lead and coordinate the Program Management support and enabling activities undertaken within a large program of work. This requires supporting and providing assurance across project planning, status reporting, financial budgeting and reporting, risk and issue management and change control processes for the Program. You will be responsible for assisting the maintenance of program quality standards by implementing and ensuring adherence to NAB Specific methodology, processes, and tools.
       YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
       Supporting the Program Manager in managing a range of projects in scale and complexity
       Facilitating and enabling effective Cost Management through analysis and assurance, working with the Delivery Leads to manage project / program budgets and support completion of work stream funding submissions, using nominated financial workbooks
       Facilitating financial planning, forecast and budget control with Stream lead and delivery leads ensuring 5% variance every month for all projects
       Advising and conducting financial treatment including OPEX CAPEX tracking, P2BAU process, procurement process, resource management.
       Conducting quality check for all program and project level reports, risk and issue management, business outcomes, hygiene for epics and tasks on systems, overall lifting of project quality
       Working closely with other SPAs within the team to share knowledge and ideas
       Supporting Project Managers with Clarity, Rally and PET tools and processes
       Supporting program Planning activities and Schedule Management
       Supporting and providing assurance over Risk, Issue and Change Management Functions
       Liaising with Project / Program Managers to support delivery against the program timelines
     Your skills and experience
       Good understanding of
        project management principles
       and key phases of
        project delivery
       , with demonstrated experience working in an agile environment
       Detailed knowledge of how to
        maintain and manage Risks & Issues Registers
       and provide governance over
        Change Control process
       , providing reporting at project and program level
       Good understanding of how to
        identify and track project dependencies
       and maintain project plans
        Strong Stakeholder Management
       skills with the ability challenge where needed, and to influence positive outcomes.
        Strong data, finance reporting skills and ability to negotiate
       on project budgets and costs, and help Project Managers with Funding Submissions and understanding of financial treatments
       Good understanding of how to effectively
        provide assurance and oversight
       over key project delivery processes and project data
       Prior project experience in the Banking and Financial Services Industry an Advantage
       Experience with
        Clarity
       Experience with
        Rally
       is an advantage
       Experience working with financial workbooks (i.e. maintain cost plans, actuals, forecasts, reference data) is mandatory for the role.
     Why you'll love working here
       1. Generous compensation and benefit package
       Attractive salary and benefits
       20-day annual leave and 7-day sick leave, etc.
       13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus
       Premium healthcare for yourself and family members
       2. Exciting career and development opportunities
       Large scale products with modern technologies in banking domain
       Clear roadmap for career advancement in both technical and leadership pathways
       Sponsored certificates in both IT and banking/finance
       Premium account on Udemy
       English learning with native teachers
       3. Professional and engaging working environment
       Hybrid working model and excellent work-life balance
       Well-equipped & modern Agile office with fully-stocked pantry
       Annual company trip and events
       A DIVERSE AND INCLUSIVE WORKPLACE WORKS BETTER FOR EVERYONE

     Job description
       Lumera
      is looking for experienced software developers to help us build our new web portal framework and be a part of building our new team at the Scandinavian Software Park in Hanoi. Are you an experienced Java developer? Are you looking for complex problem-solving and team collaboration? Join us!
       Lumera
      is a software company that develops business systems for the Life and Pensions industry. We’re the market leader in the Nordics and we’re expanding into Europe. Our team of 350 in Sweden, Norway, Netherlands & the United Kingdom is growing as we add more talented, engaged, and exceptional people. We are all waiting for you!
      Note:
        CV in English.
        A programming homework may be requested for competency assessment after interview.
      What will you do?
      You will be part of the team building the web portal framework – which integrates with into the main business system – with members both in Sweden, United Kingdom, and Vietnam. Together you will work on architectural design, extend the functionality as well as building web applications using the resulting framework.
      Initially, you will be assisting in designing API’s that the framework will use, this might be directly into the new Lumera Advanced Integration Application or through an API manager; in both cases the primary programming language is Java. The client applications are built in React using Redux and Micro frontends and the Front Ends are built using Angular. Knowledge and experience of these front ends is a bonus but certainly not a necessity.
      The entire Lumera Core system is built using Java so you could end up in another team following a specific interest or business need over time and you will have the opportunity to work with colleagues based in Hanoi who are doing some of that work.
       In this role you will:
       In collaboration with the team, design robust architectural solutions.
       Write well-designed, robust code.
       Take ownership – ownership of the parts of the system that you understand and build.
       Be honest. When you think your colleagues are wrong – let them know your opinion.
       Support what you build.
     Your skills and experience
       Minimum requirements:
       Bachelor’s degree in computer programming, computer science, or a related field.
       5+ years of software development experience.
       Strong at Java programming.
       Experience with Spring Boot, SQL and Git.
       Experience with API and system integration.
       Self-motivated individual who can plan his/her own work when needed.
       Passion for solutions and delivery.
       Great oral and written communication in English.
       Good to have:
       Knowledge and experience of React/ Angular and Micro-frontends is a bonus.
       Experienced in architecture and system design is beneficial.
     Why you'll love working here
       What we offer you:
        Developing software as services for
       Insurtech domain in a leading European company.
        Challenging
       and fun work at a product company with a complex and socially important product.
        With
       us, you get the opportunity to work agile in complex projects that provide good conditions for both your and our development. We organize "Innovation Days" and "Open Space" where you get the opportunity to work with your own creative development projects.
        Development
       opportunities internally: with us, you get the chance to develop, grow and take responsibility early. Also competence development through Lumera Academy.
        Well-being
       employees in focus: feel free to ask us about our benefits package!
        Helpful
       colleagues who always stand up for each other.
        Be part
       of a company that is now gearing up and investing internationally.
        Living
       on our Scandinavian culture and office while working in Agile environment that has strong team spirit, openness, unceasing creativity and innovation.
       What will you get?
        You’ll get to work with experienced software engineers worldwide at market leading, innovative Scandinavian SaaS company looking to accelerate growth.
        Scandinavian Work Culture: creativity, innovation and work-life balance.
        Competitive salary and 100% official salary during the probation period.
        Annual review and 13th month salary.
        Premium healthcare and accident insurance.
        Wellness package supports employees to stay healthy and wealthy.
        Exciting company outing/events and team building activities.
        On-site and training opportunities in Nordic.
        Modern working environment.
      Scandinavian Software Park
        View company
     Scandinavian Software Park is a tech hub for Scandinavia’s market leading SaaS companies.

      Cập nhật, theo dõi quá trình sử dụng của key user, end user
      Quản trị hệ thống WMS, kết nối dữ liệu từ hê thống, hỗ trợ vận hành WMS
       PHÁT TRIỂN ỨNG DỤNG
      Phân tích, thiết kế hệ thống, database, lựa chọn công nghệ phù hợp
      Lập trình, phát triển hệ thống
      Cập nhật, bảo trì cho các phần mềm đã và đang phát triển
      Đề xuất cấu hình phù hợp với tình hình hiện tại của công ty
      Đảm bảo hệ thống bảo mật, chạy ổn định, hiệu suất cao, dễ bảo trì
      Liên tục cập nhật công nghệ, kiến thức mới nhất áp dụng cho các hệ thống của công ty

     Job description
      𝐋𝐆 𝐓𝐑𝐀𝐂𝐊 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐆𝐑𝐀𝐌 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟒 - Chương trình học bổng và làm việc chính thức tại LG Electronics R&D Vietnam đã chính thức bắt đầu.
      Đừng bỏ lỡ những thông tin nóng hổi và cực hot về chương trình diễn ra duy nhất trong năm, dành cho các bạn SVNC chuyên ngành công nghệ thông tin!
     Your skills and experience
       Công việc:
      -Tham gia vào nghiên cứu và phát triển các ứng dụng thông tin giải trí trên ô tô, các hệ thống thông tin dẫn đường (AVN), hệ thống thông tin và cảnh báo về tình trạng xe (Cluster) và các hệ thống viễn thông (Telematics)
      - Phát triển các sản phẩm automotive và các công nghệ liên quan (bao gồm các ứng dụng tương tác với người dùng (HMI Applications), các HMI frameworks, các phương thức giao tiếp giữa HMI framework và middleware phía dưới…);
      - Đảm bảo phát triển phần mềm đúng hạn và đảm bảo chất lượng của sản phẩm;
       Điều kiện ứng tuyển:
      - SVNC các chuyên ngành liên quan đến công nghệ thông tin, đang trong thời gian TT hoặc chờ bằng
      - Có thể đi làm full time vào tháng 6 hoặc tháng 11/2024;
      - Điểm trung bình tích lũy (GPA) tính đến thời điểm hiện tại từ 3.2/4.0 trở lên;
      - Điểm cộng nếu bạn từng nhận được các giải thưởng hoặc tham gia các nghiên cứu khoa học.
     Why you'll love working here
       Khi đăng ký tham gia chương trình, bạn sẽ có cơ hội:
      - Nhận học bổng LG Track giá trị lên đến 30 triệu đồng và trở thành nhân viên chính thức tại công ty với mức thu nhập khởi điểm từ 15 triệu đồng/tháng, lên tới 16 tháng lương/năm;
      - Được tiếp cận các công nghệ dẫn đầu và tham gia các dự án xe hơi giá trị nhất trên toàn thế giới;
      - Tham gia các cuộc thi coding toàn cầu với nhiều phần thưởng vô cùng giá trị;
      - Thời gian làm việc linh hoạt miễn sao làm đủ 8h/ngày, có thể làm việc tại nhà 1-2 ngày trong tuần, nghỉ thứ 7, CN;
      - 19 ngày nghỉ lễ/ năm, gồm 12 ngày phép và 7 ngày nghỉ riêng của công ty;
      - Được cung cấp laptop LG Gram cấu hình mạnh, màn hình siêu to;
      - Bảo hiểm sức khỏe PVI dành riêng cho nhân viên, đóng bảo hiểm xã hội full lương;
      - Và rất rất nhiều hoạt động đào tạo (trong nước và nước ngoài), thể thao, văn nghệ, teambuilding cùng với các khu pantry sang chảnh dành riêng cho LGers.

     Top 3 reasons to join us
      Fast-growing startup
      Product that is transforming the industry
      Dynamic team with great company culture
     Job description
       Who we are
      , a pioneering force in the email marketing industry, was founded in 2019 with the aim of infusing creativity and simplicity into the email marketing space. Since then, we've grown rapidly and are recognized as one of the fastest-growing companies in our sector. With our headquarters in San Francisco, CA, United States and an engineering office nestled in the heart of Danang, we have created a thriving global team and operate with a remote-first ethos.
       About The Opportunity
       Implement, maintain, and update our component libraries, customer-facing websites/landing pages, and the web application at large
       Push the boundaries of our web application to the next level in terms of performance, accessibility, and stability
       Continuously refactor, improve and add automation testing for components (code coverage > 80%)
       Proactively collaborate with our designers, provide feedback about UI/UX + animation, and bring new ideas to the table
       Proactively research new trends and updates in UX/UI technology
       Work hand-in-hand with our current team to resolve issues in our core product, including but not limited to our proprietary WYSIWYG email builder
     Your skills and experience
       What you need to be successful
       Strong experience in HTML, CSS, and Javascript
       Fluent in React, Redux, and related tools
       Experience writing automation testing—especially the React app
       Experience in debugging and improving web app performance
       Hungry to learn and have the ability to learn things quickly
       Good at English in both written and verbal
       Nice to haves:
       Specific experience building web-based builder/drag-and-drop UI
     Why you'll love working here
      We are a profitable, fast-growing startup with a product that is transforming the industry. We value creativity, hard work, human connection, diversity, and being a great place to work!
        Competitive Compensation:
       Enjoy an attractive salary with a 13th-month bonus.
        Performance Bonuses:
       Earn extra bonuses based on the company's OKRs and your contributions.
        Stock Options:
       Share in our success with stock options for high contributions.
        Personal Development:
       Invest in yourself with our Personal Development Package, offering up to $1000/year for learning and growth.
        Premium Healthcare:
       Take care of yourself with comprehensive healthcare insurance.
        Flexible Work Hours:
       Embrace work-life balance with flexible working hours.
        Five-Day Workweek:
       Enjoy a standard workweek from Monday to Friday.
        Professional Equipment:
       Work efficiently with top-notch equipment, including a Macbook Pro or external screen in our modern office.
        Career Growth:
       Unlock opportunities for advanced career development, including overseas opportunities.
      If you're passionate about making a difference and thriving in a dynamic, collaborative environment, we want to hear from you! Apply now and join us in shaping the future.

     Top 3 reasons to join us
